headline: ‘Time for Bottom Fishing’: Analysts See Potential Rebound Ahead for These 2 Beaten-Down Stocks
summary: Are you ready to try out another round of bottom fishing? Any pescatarian gourmand will tell you that there’s plenty of good catfish at the bottom of the bayou – just don’t mind the muddy water. Stock investors would do well to follow that logic – the market bottoms are sometimes home to some fine opportunities. The key to finding those opportunities is understanding what pushed a particular stock to its market bottom in the first place. Stocks can lose value for many reasons, and fundamental un
